data.displayName: Residential Netflix Plan - New To AGL (No Exit Fee)

fees.description: May be charged when manually reconnecting or reading your meter when you move into a property or change retailer. Incl GST. Fees may vary.
May be charged when manually disconnecting or reading your meter when you move out of a property or change retailer. Incl GST. Fees may vary.
Fee may be charged when manually disconnecting your meter in other circumstances, such as non-payment. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
May be charged when manually reconnecting in other circumstances, such as after disconnection for non-payment. Includes GST. Fees may vary
A late payment fee may be charged when full payment has not been received by the bill due date. This amount is not subject to GST
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Visa debit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to card payments made at Australia Post outlets.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Visa credit cards.
A paper bill fee may apply for each bill sent by post. Includes GST.
An over the counter payment fee may apply for payments made in-person at a Post Office. Includes GST.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Mastercard debit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Mastercard credit cards.

electricityContract.terms: This offer applies to customers with an applicable network tariff. For solar feed-in tariff eligibility, or for further information about the terms and conditions applicable to this energy offer, please contact AGL on 131 245 or visit agl.com.au.
electricityContract.variation: This plan also includes variable rates, retail fees and charges, which can change at any time with notice to you. If we vary your rates, we will give you at least 5 business days prior notice of the variation. Other charges may be varied with notice to you.

incentives.description: Netflix Standard with ads is included in this plan. Optional: upgrade your Netflix tier to Standard or Premium at an additional cost

For new & moving AGL customers who stay with AGL at the same addressï¿½for 90 days from start of the plan. Credit will appear on next bill after 90 days. Non-transferable. Accounts may be excluded from receiving more than one credit per fuel in 12 months

eligibility.description: Offer applies to residential customers with an applicable network tariff. Available to both existing and new Netflix customers, 18 years old and above. You must receive bills and other account related communications via your nominated email address for the duration of this Contract. Not available for new connections
Offer only available to new AGL customers or Move-in customers
You must receive bills and other account related communications via your nominated email address for the duration of this Energy Plan.

timeOfUseRates.displayName: Residential Time of Use Off peak

greenPowerCharges.description: For $1 per week inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 20% of your usage will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.
For 4.4c /kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 100% of your usage will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.

solarFeedInTariff.displayName: AGL Retailer Feed-in Tariff (exc GST if any)

electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees and charges may apply. Please see the AGL fee schedules at agl.com.au/fees
